markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Precise Finisher](/Feats.aspx?ID=6154) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 166 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Confident Finisher

</column>

---

Even when your foe avoids your [Confident Finisher](/Actions.aspx?ID=2818), you can still hit a vital spot. On a failure with Confident Finisher, you apply your full precise strike damage instead of half.
name: Precise Finisher
